headline: KKR Receives Support and Recommendation from FUJI SOFT for Second Tender Offer and Expects to Launch Tender Offer Next Week
summary: TOKYO, November 15, 2024--KKR Receives Support and Recommendation from FUJI SOFT for Second Tender Offer and Expects to Launch Tender Offer Next Week

headline: KKR Raises Offer for Fuji Soft to 1 Yen Above Bain’s Rival Bid
summary: (Bloomberg) -- KKR & Co. raised its offer price for Fuji Soft Inc. above a rival bid by Bain Capital, winning the backing of the Japanese software developer’s board.Most Read from BloombergUnder Trump, Prepare for New US Transportation PrioritiesZimbabwe City of 700,000 at Risk of Running Dry by Year-EndNYC Congestion Pricing Plan With $9 Toll to Start in JanuarySaudi Neom Gets $3 Billion Loan Guarantee From Italy Export Credit Agency SaceThe Urban-Rural Divide Over Highway Expansion and Emissio

headline: KKR raises tender offer price for Fuji Soft acquisition
summary: Private equity firm KKR has raised its tender offer price for the acquisition of Japanese software developer Fuji Soft to 9,451 yen a share from 8,800 yen previously, the Japanese company said on...
